Body:
Description: Hi, We have started to roll out the EPP client to our AVD machines via Intune. while the installations were successful, we need to open the proper ports in the AVD firewall.
what ports need to be opened in order for the client to talk with the server?
What We've Learned Updated: The server domain might not have been set on the client.

Next Steps Updated: Shared the set server tool with the customer.
He will run it to apply the EPp server address to the epp agents.
